pages.privacy-policy: SonicPulse Privacy Policy - Your Data Security Matters SonicPulse HOME ABOUT US SPEAKERS Contact SonicPulse Privacy Policy We take your privacy seriously at SonicPulse. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Information We Collect At SonicPulse, we may collect the following types of personal information: Contact information such as name, email address, and phone number Demographic information such as age, gender, and location Payment information for purchases Information provided voluntarily in forms or surveys Information about your interactions with our website or advertisements How We Use Your Information We may use your personal information for the following purposes: To process and fulfill your orders To communicate with you about your orders, products, or services To provide customer support and address inquiries To personalize your experience and deliver relevant content To improve our products, services, and website To comply with legal obligations SonicPulse website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site.
